Tool

NameGrid Statistics for Points
ID8
AuthorO.Conrad (c) 2015
Specificationgrid

Description

For each given point statistics based on all grid cells in the defined neighbourhood will be calculated.

Parameters

NameTypeIdentifierDescriptionConstraints
Input
Grids Grid list (input)GRIDS
Points Shapes (input)POINTS
Output
